## Loading and preprocessing the data
```{r, echo=FALSE, results=FALSE}

    library("sqldf")

    library("jpeg")
```

## What is mean total number of steps taken per day?
I calcualte the total steaps taken each day.
```{r}
with(activity, tapply(steps,date, sum)) -> TotalSteps
view(TotalSteps)



```
